Description: The car automatically follow the customer in a supermarkect or even on the street.
Car shares information and detact condition of surrounding vehicle.
The ventilation fan is controlled based on the temperature and humidity.
Windows shades controlled basded on the brightness and temperature.
Light bulb can be controlled by cellphone or IR controller.
The light will automatically be dimmed according to user's habits.
A screen which can be attached to the refridgerator to record the quality of food and warn the user.
Wirelessly connect to the home appliances to control them together by one button.
Automatically open when owner stand in front of the door.
To be installed to chairs and tables and restore to original location
Use the hand gesture to control light and audio system .
Monitor the nutrition of the soil and send the data back to customer and warn them if fetilizer is needed .
measure the weight of the consumable supplies and when they are runing low; the device can order it online automatically
The timing of traffic light will change automatically based on the current traffic condition.
Shows the driection of avaliable parking space in a large parking lot
The blocking door will allow adults pass throght and limit the child or pets going through
By scanning the barcode on the package by the phone; the medicien information will be automatically loaded and the phone will be able to remind the user to take the medicine accoringly.
All the controller and sensor will be placed in a box which is will insulated and is water and dust resisted so that it can work in a harsh environment.
All the controller and sensor will be placed within the wall outlet to make the smart home controller invisiable.
The light will iluminte part of the room or space by detecting the motion of the user.
The device will sense the humidity of the soil and automatically water the plants acoording to the feedback
The system will automatically determine the optimal watering schedule for crops accoding to soil humidity and weather conditions
The shelf is made from wood and has a structure and shape similar to a small plant
The shelf resemble the look and feel of a tree with several branches to hold on small plants
The 'mini bar' is to be mounted on the wall and is fordable
The lower layer of the drawer will automatically open when pets come close and refill if the food/water is empty
This solar panel will have a shape of a tree. It sits harmony with trees on the street
The task is written on the stickers which is  stick to the wall with light and sound on for warning
It has a shape of a trumpet can play music when you plug in the phone.
The bird cage is consist of a bottom part resembling a real nest and top part made from glass which allows seeing for people
The rice cooker stores rice and is connected to the water tube. It can be controlled remotely and will automatically cook rice
The coffee machine is meant to be used in an office  and can make custimized  coffee with diffenent kinds of beans and strength. The order can be made remotely using app on the phone
The machine stores all kinds of raw material for making cocktails (alchohol; fruit; juice ect.) and can make customized cocktail with a click on the phone
It will automatically make simple breakfast when you get up (sandwiches; omelette; steam bombs and so on)
It can make customizable blender juice and suggest the fruit to buy in the morning
It works with smart home products which can adjust things like the lightness of the bulb; the temprature of the room; volume of speaker
It display the environment condition of the home (temperature; humidity...); reminds tasks and play music and news
It works with smart home products which can adjust things like the lightness of the bulb; the temprature of the room; volume of speaker by rotating the knobs or voice control
This clock is very effective in waking up the user. The user have to get up and do some required exercise before the clock can be disabled
The device will help turn off all the lights; AC; in the room when the user go to sleep and display light that can improve the quality of sleep
